Name: Real Virtual Desktops
About the game: Real Virtual Desktops extends the Virtual Desktops feature in Windows allowing for different desktop icons and layouts on each desktop. You can use the beautifully designed RVD client or switch desktops right from the Windows UI! RVD even implements hotkeys to move open windows between desktops. Although not required, it is designed to work alongside Wallpaper Engine which also has Virtual Desktop support. Note: RVD does not support renaming desktops on Windows 10 but to make up for it we added the ability to have different wallpapers for different Virtual Desktops, a feature previously exclusive to Windows 11.
